text: Max Ray Brannon (born December 22, 1933) was an American politician in the state of Georgia. Brannon, a funeral director, founded (1967) and operated the Max Brannon and Sons Funeral Home in Calhoun, Georgia. He is also a former probate court judge as well as coroner for Gordon County, Georgia.http://dlg.galileo.usg.edu/statreg-images/pdfs/1981.pdf He served in the Georgia State Senate for district 51 from 1981 to 1991.https://news.google.com/newspapers?nid=2213&dat;=19900808&id;=xiMxAAAAIBAJ&sjid;=xDoDAAAAIBAJ&pg;=1533,2660457 ==References== Category:1933 births Category:Living people Category:People from Gordon County, Georgia Category:Georgia (U.S. state) state senators
title: Max Brannon
